🧿 Villainized 🧿

  • Whenever a villainized creature takes damage, you can cause it to suffer 1d4 psychic damage. 
  • Each time you activate this bonus damage, you can’t trigger it again until the villainized creature has made an attack or targeted an unwilling creature with a spell or ability since the last time it took the damage.
  • The die increases in size at each growth level, becoming a d6 at 5th level, d8 at 11th level, and d10 at 17th level.

Villainized does not stack. If a creature gains the villainized effect while already villainized, only the effect with the longer remaining duration remains.
